description.narrative: EPI: Quality expanded programme of immunization (EPI) services are available and demanded by families, to protect women and girls and boys from vaccine-preventable diseases, especially in most deprived areas, which contributes to Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Immunization, Immunization Services As Part Of Primary Health Care, Strengthening Primary Health Care And High-Impact Health Interventions. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved access and increased utilization of quality and equity focused Maternal, Neonatal, and Child Health (MNCH) and immunization services for mothers, new born, U5 children and adolescent girls in most deprived provinces and areas

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: EPI: Quality expanded programme of immunization (EPI) services are available and demanded by families, to protect women and girlsand boys from vaccine-preventable diseases, especially in most deprived areas

description.narrative: During the reporting period the National Expanded Programme on Immunization EPI in Afghanistan continued to provide children, especially most vulnerable, with necessary vaccines to protect them from Vaccine Preventable Diseases (VPD) with UNICEF and partners support.EPI services were sustained in all regions under the conditions of COVID 19 pandemic, and escalating conflict, through different modalities of service provision including Fixed health facilities, Outreach and Mobile health teams, and by increasing demand through community engagement and sustaining vaccine supplies procurement and distribution and maintaining cold chain system. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:12/01/2022
